SEARCH
Package score

Class Score

java.lang.Object
score.Score
public class Score extends Object
Represents the score for a Yahtzee game. Includes scores for various categories and methods to access and modify them.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Score()
    Default constructor initializing the player to an empty string.

    Constructor initializing the player with the provided name.

    • setBonus

      public void setBonus()
      Sets the bonus score if it has not already been set. A bonus is awarded if the total without bonus is 63 or more.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the bonus has already been set.

    • setFullHouse

      public void setFullHouse(int fullHouse1)
      Sets the score for 'Full House' if it has not already been set.
      Parameters:
      fullHouse1 - Score for 'Full House'. 25 points for a full house, 0 for not a full house.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the score has already been set.

    • getSmallStraight

      public int getSmallStraight()
      Retrieves the score for the 'Small Straight' category.
      Returns:
      the score for 'Small Straight'. Returns 0 if not set, otherwise 30.

    • setSmallStraight

      public void setSmallStraight(int smallStraight1)
      Sets the score for the 'Small Straight' category if it has not already been set.
      Parameters:
      smallStraight1 - the score for 'Small Straight'. Valid values are 0 or 30.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the score has already been set.

    • getLargeStraight

      public int getLargeStraight()
      Retrieves the score for the 'Large Straight' category.
      Returns:
      the score for 'Large Straight'. Returns 0 if not set, otherwise 40.

    • setLargeStraight

      public void setLargeStraight(int largeStraight1)
      Sets the score for the 'Large Straight' category if it has not already been set.
      Parameters:
      largeStraight1 - the score for 'Large Straight'. Valid values are 0 or 40.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the score has already been set.

    • getYahtzee

      public int getYahtzee()
      Retrieves the score for the 'Yahtzee' category.
      Returns:
      the score for 'Yahtzee'. Returns 0 if not set or 50 for the first Yahtzee, and 100 for additional Yahtzees.

    • setYahtzee

      public void setYahtzee(int yahtzee1)
      Sets the score for the 'Yahtzee' category. Adds 100 points for additional Yahtzees after the first.
      Parameters:
      yahtzee1 - the score for 'Yahtzee'. Must be 50 for the first Yahtzee or 0 for no Yahtzee.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the score is invalid.

    • getChance

      public int getChance()

      Throws:

      Throws:

    • emptyFields

      public int[] emptyFields()
      Returns an array indicating which fields have not yet been filled.
      Returns:
      an array where each element corresponds to a specific field; a value of 1 indicates the field is empty.
